title: Tail-Tell Signs of Trouble
description: Dante knows that skipping work probably isn't the best idea if he wants to impress his lover, club owner Kale. Too bad he can't figure out any other way to explore the side of Kale he hardly knows, the side that's a formidable Dom. Kale is furious when he finds out what Dante is up to, but he soon learns that protecting Dante from a certain side of him isn't going to work. Can Dante show Kale that he wants everything Kale has to give?
author: Misa Izanaki
